title: Who is the Online Meeting service for?
paragraph: Our Online Meeting service is designed for professionals and organizations in the construction industry who need to host virtual meetings, collaborate with team members, or connect with clients and partners remotely. It’s ideal for general contractors, subcontractors, project managers, architects, and developers.

title: What features does the Online Meeting service offer?
paragraph: Our Online Meeting service includes features such as video conferencing, screen sharing, meeting recording, real-time chat, and calendar integration. It also supports virtual meeting rooms, document sharing, and participant management to enhance your virtual collaboration.

title: Are there any additional fees?
paragraph: No hidden fees. The cost of using our Online Meeting service is included in the pricing plan you choose. Any additional charges, if applicable, will be clearly specified in your plan details.

title: What plan and payment options are available?
paragraph: We offer various pricing plans to meet different needs, including options for monthly or annual subscriptions. For detailed information about our plans and payment options, please visit our Pricing page.

title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan at any time?
paragraph: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time to better suit your requirements. Simply contact our support team to adjust your subscription as needed.
